main.name: Bastien Jeannelle
main.occupation: Cloud and Network Infrastructure master student / SRE engineer working student
main.description: Welcome to my resume website, where you can learn more about me and get a snapshot of what I can do
main.bio: I am a Cloud and Network infrastructures enthusiast, particularly interested in reliability, micro-services and automation. I studied in many countries where I worked on various projects with a wide range of people. Always looking for new challenges to test and improve my skills! This website is hosted on my bare-metal kubernetes cluster, which is a personal test environment to keep up to date with micro-services technology.

resume.skillmessage: I have experience in the most popular Containerization, Cloud providers, CI/CD and network thecnologies.

education.degree: Master in Cloud and Network infrastructure
Master in Cloud and Network infrastructure
education.description: Projects with GCP, AWS, Kubernetes, Ansible and Maven.

education.degree: Bachelor in Computer Network Management and Design
education.description: Projects with Python, Nagios, AWS, Cisco switches and routers.

education.degree: Technology diploma in Networks and Telecommunications
education.description: Switching, routing, Python, C, Java, HTML/CSS, SQL, WAN/LAN/WLAN/PAN. Cisco CCNA routing and switching 1 & 2 obtained

work.title: SRE engineer working student
work.description: Assure and improve the reliability of the site, for both outside customers - Ingresses, HA, downtime reduction- and developpers - Containerization, Automation. Azure Cloud, AKS kubernetes clusters, Azure devOps / Jenkins, Vault, Helm, Git.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
